title: Ping MS/Latency Spikes
body:
In game my ping holds steady around* 40-60 *ms which is perfectly fine and playable, however, at random points in the game it jumps to about *1000+ *and I usually have to disconnect my internet to fix it (roughly 2-3 minutes). Not only this, **each time I disconnect my champion never returns to base and ends up dying**. Thus result in ruining a lot of games for not only myself but the friends I play with. Any and all help is appreciated on this issue. 

Regards

replies.body:
Hey Sam, might wanna delete that attachment. It's got your IP in it.

Is this an issue that has only happened recently or was it always happening?
Haha, thanks for the heads up. If anyone is having the same issues,  RELEASE/RENEW IP AND FLUSH DNS fixed the issue for me.

Really? That's very strange.

But then again, internet connections are very strange. I won't question it.

Thank you for telling me what worked, though! I'll keep note.
